g.text: 64 Bytes: Multi-Band Architecture for Topical + Structural Clustering

64 bytes = 512 bits, divided into purpose-specific bands:
ðŸ’¡ Start with 128-bit STRUCTURAL only â†’ Enable bands as needed â†’ Reserved bits = 0x00

â€¢ Layout patterns (grid vs list vs article)
All zeros = neutral for distance calc
512-bit = 8 Ã— 64-bit XOR + 8 Ã— POPCNT + 7 Ã— ADD
But: do we need all bands?
Sources: BBC, CNN, Reuters, AP, local papers
Band mask controls which to compare
